biotools.summary: Carbapenemase-encoding gene Copy Number Estimator (ccne) is a tool to estimate the copy number of AMR genes. It uses housekeeping gene as the reference and compares the count of reads that mapped to AMR genes with the count of reads that mapped to the reference gene.

bioschemas.name: CCNE
bioschemas.summary: Carbapenemase-encoding gene Copy Number Estimator (ccne) is a tool to estimate the copy number of AMR genes. It uses housekeeping gene as the reference and compares the count of reads that mapped to AMR genes with the count of reads that mapped to the reference gene.
